alert.note: Alert for Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; South Central Mountains; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 22 at 4:58PM MDT until October 23 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 7 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...South Central Mountains, Harding County, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass and Union County. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 7 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; South Central Mountains; Union County
